room_title: Escape room "Sherlock's Study" by Exodus Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: The staff here is fun,and have a good sense of humor! I'm still buzzing from the rush of our successful teamwork! Sherlock Room, perfect for the educated,artistic Team #thebookcellar! Looking for something New to do with your friends and family? Exodus Escape Room is Waiting for you! Thanks Chad,artistic Trevor, our host,for an Awesome Adventure!

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock's Study" by Exodus Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: Had a blast good timeseven if we were in the dark and handcuffed

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock's Study" by Exodus Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: My group did the Sherlock room and it was a lot of fun! We had nine people which was a little bit of a crowd. The only problem that we had was that the finally lock was difficult to open and keep us from getting out in the hour. They did give us more time though because they knew that we had the code. My family is really excited to do this again though!

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock's Study" by Exodus Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: Had such a fantastic fun time! The staff was extremely friendly and courteous ! Great event to do with a good group of friends! We did the Sherlock room, and were able to escape! In "record" time perhaps! We had 25 mins and 44 seconds to spare! Whoot ! Will definitely come back to try the Trap Room next ! Смайлик «grin» dundunn dunnnnn!!!

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock's Study" by Exodus Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: This was my first experience with escape rooms, and I couldn't have asked for a better introduction! I brought a group here yesterday for my birthday party and we ALL had a blast! The staff was wonderful, funny and incredibly sweet. We are definitely coming back for the Sherlock room!

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock's Study" by Exodus Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: What an amazing experience!! Loved everything about it! The staff was amazing and the experience was like no other! I highly recommend doing this. I had a huge party of 18 people and they accommodated us. Split us up between the Sherlock room and Escape room. Made it a competition! So much fun! You HAVE to experience this! Going back for more! Thank you!!
